text:
STATE OF OKLAHOMA
OFFICE OF THE GOVERNOR
Honorable Oren Harris, M.C,
Page 2 - April 2k, 1961
We respectfully urge that every consideration be given
to legislation pending the Congress which would give national
impetus to educational television.
Sinverely,
GOVERNOR
JHE/sps
bcc Mr. John W# Dunn, Director
Oklahoma Educational Television Authority
P. 0. Box 2005>
Norman, Oklahoma
